Idol was the biggest thing anyone had seen since, well, the Spice Girls. And just days after the season finale in 2002, it was announced that Idol was heading to America-with its star judge. We had seen footage and of course we knew for sure that Simon Cowell had to be there, says Mike Darnell , Fox's head of alternative entertainment.
